name: DeeplTranslate
description: DeeplTranslate is a tool that can help you translate text using Deepl's API. With this tool, you can easily translate text from one language to another with just a few simple commands. DeeplTranslate supports a wide range of languages and provides accurate translations that are easy to understand.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users. But watch out for Discord - nothing gets deleted on here.
author: Alcor
